attributes.action: Change the prices of Caramel Shortbread Bites to £1
attributes.additional_details: I would like this to be done because the caramel shortbread bites aren’t bought much so the price might as well be reduced and they are favoured but some people don’t pay for them because they’re  to expensive
attributes.background: Just to change the prices because their to expensive in my opinion many others agree

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the prices of food stuffs are a matter for their manufacturers and individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
